transbit.tbits.common
Class Mail

java.lang.Object
  transbit.tbits.common.Mail

public class Mail
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains utility methods to send mails using /usr/lib/sendmail.

Version:
: $Id: $
Author:
: Vinod Gupta, : Vaibhav

Parameters:

fromAddress - The sender address for the message.

sortCSV

public static java.lang.String sortCSV(java.lang.String aArg)
This method returns the given comma-separated string values back in same fashion but sorted in alphabetical order.

Parameters:
aArg - Argument String as a Comma-separated List.
Returns:
Comma-separated List of values passed in sorted order.
